    • Method Detail

      • addCharges

        public void addCharges(double charges)
        Method for adding charges to a Customer balance. Accpets a charge amount as a parameter and adds that amount to the Customer's balance. Then the new balance is set. Throws if the charge amount is negative or zero.
        Parameters:
        charges -

      • isValidPhoneNumber

        public boolean isValidPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phoneNumber)
        Precondition test to determine if phone number is valid Uses regular expressions to ensure phone number matches a specific pattern: 10 digits in length
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber -

      • payBalance

        public void payBalance(double payment)
        Method for paying the balance for a Customer. Accepts a payment amount as a parameter and subtracts that amount from the Customer's balance. Then the new balance is set. Throws if the payment amount is negative or zero.
        Parameters:
        payment -
